titleStmt.title: The dead saint speaking, or, A sermon preached upon occasion of the death of that eminent man, Mr. Mathew Newcomen ... wherein is succinctly discoursed (to a popular auditory in Dedham) what instructions are given and sealed to the living by the death of the righteous servants of God / by J.F., Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, John, 1623-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. and R.R. for Edward Giles ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Fairfax. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
